org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka

类 KafkaJsonTableSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.KafkaJsonTableSource
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.api.table.sources.StreamTableSource<org.apache.flink.api.table.Row>, org.apache.flink.api.table.sources.TableSource<org.apache.flink.api.table.Row>

    public abstract class KafkaJsonTableSource
extends Object
    A version-agnostic Kafka JSON StreamTableSource.

    The version-specific Kafka consumers need to extend this class and override getKafkaConsumer(String, Properties, DeserializationSchema)}.

    The field names are used to parse the JSON file and so are the types.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setFailOnMissingField

        public void setFailOnMissingField(boolean failOnMissingField)
        Configures the failure behaviour if a JSON field is missing.

        By default, a missing field is ignored and the field is set to null.

        参数:
        failOnMissingField - Flag indicating whether to fail or not on a missing field.
